caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain foreign entities.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill prohibits entities from designated countries that pose national security risks (as identified by US Intelligence) from purchasing real property in Texas. As China is consistently listed in Annual Threat Assessments, Chinese government entities, China-headquartered organizations, and organizations controlled by them would be banned from purchasing land, improvements, mines, minerals, or timber in Texas. The attorney general can enforce this through court action.

中文摘要：
该法案禁止来自被美国情报机构认定为对国家安全构成威胁的指定国家的实体购买德克萨斯州的不动产。由于中国在年度威胁评估中持续被列入，中国政府实体、总部位于中国的组织以及受其控制的组织将被禁止在德克萨斯州购买土地、房产、矿场、矿产或林木。州检察长可以通过法院行动执行此法律。

Most likely committees:
1. State Affairs Committee
2. Business & Commerce Committee
3. International Relations & Economic Development Committee
